args.instructions: 1) From sec_lookup_math8, list all MATH 8 sections with their section numbers, meeting days/times, and instructor names. 2) From prof_ratings_math8, identify the instructor(s) with the highest average rating (use difficulty and would-take-again as tie-breakers if needed). 3) Filter the sections to those that DO NOT overlap with the student’s existing class time: Monday and Wednesday 9:00–10:25 AM. A conflict exists if any part of a MATH 8 meeting falls within that MW 9:00-10:25 window. 4) Produce a concise JSON summary with keys: "top_instructors" (array of instructor names), "non_conflicting_sections" (array of objects with section_number, days, time_range, instructor), and "rationale" (one-sentence explanation).

Present the highest-rated MATH 8 instructors and list the available sections that avoid conflicts with the student’s CS 50 class (MW 9:00-10:25 AM). Use a friendly, concise tone with markdown bullet points and a brief recommendation to enroll early.
